775550.name: Yoltrund: Original Soundtrack
775550.description:
The unique world of Yoltrund would not be complete without the soundtrack used in the game. It is with the pleasure of all of us at Templarius Studios to present the Yoltrund Original Soundtrack featuring each track used in the game for your enjoyment!

Handmade by lead designer Michael Cox, we guarantee that these tracks will put you in the world of Yoltrund (not literally).

• Please note – The Yoltrund: Original Soundtrack will be placed in your Yoltrund folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Yoltrund\Yoltrund Original Soundtrack

Credits

All tracks composed and recorded by Michael W. Cox.

Track List

  • 1. The Halls of Yoltrund (Theme)
  • 2. Song of the King
  • 3. Song of the Reig
  • 4. The Tunnel
  • 5. The Crystal River
  • 6. Kurldehv - The Steps of Judgement
  • 7. The Judge King
  • 8. Parforiah - The Sea of Incontinence
  • 9. Loss of Love
  • 10. Hekehldahr - The Realm of Pride
  • 11. Upper Nekariin - The Lustful of the Flesh
  • 12. Nether Nekariin - The Lustful of Value
  • 13. Horohktahl I - The Realm of Rape
  • 14. Horohktahl II
  • 15. Horohktahl III
  • 16. Valkahei I - The Realm of Betrayal
  • 17. Valkahei II
  • 18. Valkahei III
  • 19. The Demon Kings
  • 20. Grace of the King
  • 21. Letharus - Reborn
775550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
